title: Will Halsall’s grilled squid with crispy pancetta and red pepper salsa

ingredients.item: 1 red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
2 red peppers, deseeded and finely chopped
1⁄2 x 25g pack mint,  leaves roughly chopped
1⁄2 x 28g pack coriander, leaves roughly chopped

instructions.step: Start with the salsa. Heat the oil in a large saucepan and gently cook the chilli, onion and pepper for 8-10 minutes, until soft but not browned. Take off the heat and stir in the sweet chilli sauce. Add the herbs and lime zest and juice, then season and set aside.
Using a heavy-based frying or griddle pan, cook the pancetta over a medium-high heat for 1-2 minutes on each side, until golden and crisp; set aside on kitchen paper.

Cut each squid tube in half lengthways, open out and atten; halve again if large. Season the squid pieces and tentacles; brush with the oil. Cook over a high heat for 11⁄2 minutes on each side, until golden, but don’t overcook, or it’ll toughen. For best results, weigh the squid down with a heat-resistant object to keep it from curling.
To serve, spread the rocket on plates. Arrange the squid on top and dress with the salsa and pancetta.
